entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
